name: SnowSlide
description:
This is my submission for the 42nd Mini Jam, SnowSlide!

Being a snowball, you have an incredible sense of self-preservation, as all snowballs do. Not too keen on melting, you prepare to roll through checkpoints and over the snowy paths to make your way to the fridge at it's finish.

WASD to move, SPACE to jump and P to restart the entire game. Mouse movement will move the camera.
